code: import"./Logo.css";import React from"react";import logoImage from"../images/logo.png";import darkLogoImage from"../images/logo-dark.png";import{useTheme}from"../ThemeContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Logo(){const{theme}=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-center text-center ".concat(theme==="dark"?"dark":""),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:" ".concat(theme==="dark"?"dark":""),children:theme==="light"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logoImage,alt:"Light Logo",className:"logo"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:darkLogoImage,alt:"Dark Logo",className:"logo"})})});}export default Logo;
